chunks.en: The 2024 Zeekr 001 is on the market, and I'm very tempted.

chunks.en: WE Version: 100 kWh Qilin battery, rear-wheel drive, 750km, 5.9s, lidar, Yamaha audio, leather seats, 269,000 yuan;
What kind of brain-dead person came up with the we me you version naming scheme?

After watching yesterday's press conference, I feel that new energy vehicles are indeed in a period of rapid iteration. I'll definitely get one after a few years when things are more stable. After all, at the current rate of iteration, I estimate I'll be tempted every two years. ğŸ˜
@wxw752 So that's where you were waiting...
@BeforeTooLate #71 Maybe in his eyes, BMW is an unattainable brand, so he finally scraped together enough money for an X1 and had to buy one to bring glory to his ancestors.
@captain55 What kind of brainless leek would buy an X1 now?
The only thing that deters me from this car is that it's a bit wide.
Surrender, Jun'er, it's all Geely out there.

chunks.zh: æ™ºèƒ½åŒ–æ–¹é¢ï¼Œæœ‰ç‚¹éš¾é¡¶çš„ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿ Intel æ˜¯ææ°ªçš„è‚¡ä¸œï¼Œ001 æ·±åº¦æ†ç»‘ Mobileye ï¼Œæ²¡åŠæ³•æ¢ï¼› Mobileye çš„ Q6H èŠ¯ç‰‡æ˜å¹´æ‰ä¸Šå¸‚ï¼Œä»Šå¹´åªèƒ½ç»§ç»­ç”¨ Q5H*2 ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ä¸çŸ¥é“ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸å † Q5H*4 ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä»–ä»¬è§‰å¾—ä»–ä»¬èµ°çš„æŠ€æœ¯è·¯çº¿ï¼Œ48TOPS çš„ä¸“ç”¨èŠ¯ç‰‡è¶³å¤Ÿä»–ä»¬çš„ SuperVision ä½¿ç”¨å§ã€‚
chunks.en: In terms of intelligence, it's a bit difficult, because Intel is a shareholder of Zeekr, and the 001 is deeply tied to Mobileye, so it can't be changed. Mobileye's Q6H chip will only be available next year, and this year they can only continue to use Q5H*2, but I don't know why they don't stack Q5H*4. Maybe they think that the technical route they are taking, the 48TOPS dedicated chip is enough for their SuperVision to use.

However, Mobileye's main focus is a crowdsourced map REM. As long as the cars equipped with their system drive on the road a lot and scan enough data, they can improve the advanced assisted driving. But REM has a series of problems such as domestic surveying and mapping, so the performance is very poor.
Interrupting Lei Zi's spellcasting...
I really like the appearance of Zeekr and Avatr ğŸ˜
@captain55 #100 Laughing to death ğŸ˜‚
@qoo2019 #4 Lithium iron phosphate is definitely cheaper than ternary lithium.
Air suspension has a lifespan of 5 years, and it will cost 10,000 yuan to replace one at that time.
@captain55 At this price point, there are so many Geeks, Nio and Li Auto around. How can you still say these things at this stage?
Even if you have to buy this year, be sure to wait until after June.
@wnanbei 96th floor @livid personal attack
@captain55 #70 Laughing, X1 haha
